_sText:
1.General Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
	Title ............ zm_horror_on_the_road2_reedited
	Date ............. 29 April, 2011
	Version .......... 2
	Author ........... Malozemov Uri $$ur4ik$$
	E-mail ........... ur4ik456@mail.ru
	Other maps ....... zm_Island_of_Death_beta, zm_lost_hotel_v2, zm_horror_on_the_road, ze_infested_prison_escape_v1...v2 and other
2.Play'n'Map Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
        Max players ...... 68
	Editor used ...... Ultimate Source SDK SP4
	Build Time ....... 2 days
	Compile PC ....... Intel Core 2 Duo MHz / 3 gb (Windows XP Sp3)
	Compile time ..... 2 Min 29 Sec. 
        HDR.................. No
3.Map Installation
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	Unzip all files into your steam\steamapps\username\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps  directory


Distinctions from zm_horror_on_the_road2: 

- Map working on OB engine.
- Added new space for the survival of.
- Changed the road and new objects.
